stem.paragraph_1: You discover a receptor that forms a high affinity interaction with its ligand. In which of the following types of cell communication is the receptor most likely involved?
Which of the following receptors would generate the fastest cellular response?
In a signaling pathway that utilizes a heterotrimeric GTP-binding protein which of the following components could activate a downstream pathway?
Which of the following is the best example of negative feedback?

options: MAP kinase activates a guanine-nucleotide exchange factor for Ras
Protein kinase C activates phospholipase C
MAP kinase kinase phosphorylates receptor tyrosine kinase

stem.paragraph_1: Cholera toxin adds an ADP-ribose to G<sub>α</sub> and inhibits it catalytic activity. Which of the following is the most likely effect of cholera toxin?
Which of the following would you expect not to associate with the cytosolic domain of a receptor tyrosine kinase?
You discover a domain in phospholipase C that resembles a GTPase-activating protein. The most likely effect of this  domain is which of the following?

options: Increase amount of active phospholipase C
